snippet: Instead of looking away, Mr. Bowden chose to write deeply researched books about the borderland drug war and its many slaughters.
abstract: Lawrence Downes Editorial Appreciation of author and journalist Charles Bowden, upon his death at age 69; contends that Bowden was committed to witnessing the world, and lacked ability most people have to look away.
lead_paragraph: Instead of looking away, Mr. Bowden chose to write deeply researched books about the borderland drug war and its many slaughters.

headline.main: Charles Bowden, a Writer on the Edge
headline.print_headline: Charles Bowden, a Writer on the Edge
